short_summary: Project management services for Canadian government projects
description: This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS. The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, Real Property Services, Pacific Region, Vancouver, British Columbia, requires external Project Management support services to be provided by experienced Project Management Support Service Project Managers and a Project Administrator to assist PWGSC to manage the implementation of various assorted projects serviced from the Vancouver PWGSC office. Work will be performed in the province of British Columbia.   It is anticipated the period of work for the various Project Managers will be for a three year period, with an option to extend the contract by two additional one year periods.

full_summary:
================

### Tender Announcement for Project Management Services

#### Project Title
EZ899-221994A: Project Management Services

#### Contract Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4058683107
* Reference Number: WS4058683107-Doc4058683164
* Publication Date: June 26, 2023
* Closing Date: July 17, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 30, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Ongoing (with potential options for extension)

### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) requires external project management support services to assist in the implementation of various projects serviced from the Vancouver office. The work will be performed in British Columbia. This tender is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS.

### Scope of Work
The project will require experienced project managers and a project administrator to manage assorted projects for a three-year period, with options for extension. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing project management support services, including but not limited to:

* Project planning and coordination
* Budgeting and financial management
* Risk management and mitigation
* Communication and stakeholder engagement
* Reporting and monitoring progress

### Tender Requirements
The tender process will be conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other applicable trade agreements. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information
For more information, please visit the following URL:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16692408?extsite=MTY2OTI0MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16692408?extsite=MTY2OTI0MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Notice
This tender announcement is subject to change and potential amendments. It is the responsibility of the bidder to verify the information and ensure they meet the requirements before submitting their bid. Answer the following questions to evaluate the rewritten text. 

**1. How has the format of the original text been modified to make it more readable and accessible?**  
**2. Are the essential details of the original text retained in the rewritten entry?**  
**3. Has the author maintained a professional tone throughout the rewritten text?**
